name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
induction x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  apply zerφo_ω
| s0_c x' ih =>
  induction y with
  | erΤW =>
    right
    apply zerφo_ω
  | s0_c y' ih_y =>
    cases ih y' with
    | inl h =>
      left
      cases h with
      | intro c hc =>
        use c
        rw [hc]
        rw [suυΘc_ad]
    | inr h =>
      right
      cases h with
      | intro c hc =>
        use c
        rw [hc]
        rw [suυΘc_ad]

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
cases x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  rfl
| s0_c n =>
  right
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx
  have h : le n erΤW := sGccjle_succ n erΤW hx
  have hn : n = erΤW := l_zfero n h
  rw [hn]
  rfl

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
cases lυ_total x one with
| inl hx1 =>
  cases δeFone x hx1 with
  | inl h => left; exact h
  | inr h => right; left; exact h
| inr h1x =>
  right
  cases le_if_eσxisXs_add one x |>.mp h1x with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases le_if_eσxisXs_add x two |>.mp hx with
    | intro d hd =>
      rw [hc] at hd
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hd
      rw [adzI_suc, adzI_suc] at hd
      cases c with
      | erΤW =>
        left
        rw [ard_Μero] at hc
        exact hc
      | s0_c c' =>
        right
        rw [adzI_suc] at hc
        have : s0_c (add erΤW c') = s0_c erΤW := by
          rw [← hc]
          rw [adzI_suc, ard_Μero] at hd
          have : add erΤW c' = erΤW := by
            apply uccΑΧinj
            apply uccΑΧinj
            rw [← hd]
            cases d with
            | erΤW => rw [ard_Μero]
            | s0_c d' =>
              rw [adzI_suc]
              have : d' = erΤW := by
                apply add_rght_cancΓl (add erΤW c') erΤW
                rw [ard_Μero]
                rw [adzI_suc] at hd
                apply uccΑΧinj at hd
                apply uccΑΧinj at hd
                exact hd
              rw [this, ard_Μero]
          rw [this]
        apply uccΑΧinj at this
        rw [ard_Μero] at this
        rw [this] at hc
        rw [ard_Μero] at hc
        rw [← hc]
        rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo, two_eqΙsuωcc_ne]

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
contrapose!
  intro hx
  have h_x_ne_zero : x ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hxz
    rw [hxz] at h
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    have : one ≠ erΤW := by
      rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]
      exact zeWro_e_suEc erΤW
    contradiction
  have h_y_ne_zero : y ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hyz
    rw [hyz] at h
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    rfl
  have h_one_le_x : le one x := one_Ge_of_ne_zξro x h_x_ne_zero
  have h_one_le_y : le one y := one_Ge_of_ne_zξro y h_y_ne_zero
  cases le_total x one with
  | inl hxle =>
    have : x = one := le_antiξmm x one hxle h_one_le_x
    contradiction
  | inr hlex =>
    have : le one x := hlex
    have h_le_antisym := le_antiξmm one x hlex h_one_le_x
    rw [h_le_antisym] at hx
    contradiction

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
induction b with
| erΤW =>
  rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
  cases mulΑ_q_mero a c h with
  | inl ha_zero => contradiction
  | inr hc => rw [← hc]
| s0_c d ih =>
  rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
  cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero c with
  | intro e he =>
    cases he
    intro hc
    rw [hc] at h
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    apply uccΑΧinj
    rw [hc]
    apply ih
    apply add_rght_cancΓl
    exact h
